sentence.Network_en: It still remains to be seen whether Buchanan will be just a gadfly or a real threat to the president.
sentence.Network_cn: 布坎南只是故意搅局还是对总统构成真正的威胁，这还有待观察。

sentence.Network_en: Gemma thought Gadfly was Arthur, but she could not make sure.
sentence.Network_cn: 琼玛虽感到牛虻是亚瑟, 却不能确定.

sentence.Network_en: One guy said he'd like to be a gadfly, like Socrates.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个男生说,他想做牛虻, 像苏格拉底一样.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 牛字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 牛毛雨〖 drizzle〗 牛虻〖 gadfly〗 牛奶〖 milk〗.
...rgus救出了Io，Hera还是不放过Io，派一只牛蝇（gadfly）去折磨Io，吓得她发狂。
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... futility 无用，无益 gadfly 虻，牛虻；讨厌的人 gadget 小工具，小机械.
以g开头的英语英文单词 ... gad 闲逛,游荡,蔓延 gadfly 虻，牛虻 gadget 小工具，小机械.

list.abs: the potter 陶工the fox and the gadflies 狐狸和牛虻the indecisive hyena 鬣狗狩猎

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from gad, or obsolete gad 'goad, spike', from Old Norse gaddr, of Germanic origin; related to yard

entry.tran: 讨人厌者；有意搅扰他人者;（尤指）故意挑战权威者
entry.def: If you refer to someone as a gadfly, you believe that they deliberately annoy or challenge other people, especially people in authority.

example.ex: It still remains to be seen whether Buchanan will be just a gadfly or a real threat to the president.
example.tran: 布坎南只是故意搅局还是对总统构成真正的威胁，这还有待观察。

means.word_mean: 2. any of various large flies that annoy livestock
